text: "Touch Me" is a 1968 song by The Doors and is the leading single from their fourth studio album The Soft Parade. It went to number 1 in Canada, number 3 in the United States, number 6 in New Zealand, number 7 in South Africa, number 10 in Australia and Switzerland, number 16 in Austria and number 21 in the Netherlands. ==References== Category:1968 songs Category:The Doors songs
title: Touch Me (The Doors song)
